info.description: Provides create, retrieve, update and delete (CRUD) services for  Acumos data including solutions, artifacts and users. All service endpoints require basic HTTP authentication.
info.title: Acumos Common Data Service REST API

get.summary: Gets a page of artifacts, optionally sorted on fields.

post.summary: Creates a new artifact.

get.summary: Gets the count of artifacts.
Searches for artifacts with names or descriptions that contain the search term
Searches for artifacts using the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Defaults to and (conjunction); send junction query parameter = o for or (disjunction).
Gets the artifact for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes the artifact with the specified ID.

get.summary: Gets the solution revisions that use the specified artifact ID.
Gets the list of access type codes.
Gets the list of artifact type codes.
Gets the list of deployment status codes.
Gets the list of login provider codes.
Gets the list of model type codes.
Gets the list of message severity codes.
Gets the list of notification delivery mechanism codes.
Gets the list of value set names.
Gets the list of code-name pairs for the specified value set.
Gets the list of peer status codes.
Gets the list of step status codes.
Gets the list of step type codes.
Gets the list of subscription scope codes.
Gets the list of toolkit type codes.
Gets the list of validation status codes.
Gets the list of validation type codes.

post.summary: Creates a new site configuration.

get.summary: Gets the site configuration for the specified key.

delete.summary: Deletes a site configuration.

get.summary: Gets a page of peer groups, optionally sorted.

post.summary: Creates a new peer group.

get.summary: Gets a page of peer-solution membership mappings, optionally sorted.

post.summary: Grants access for the specified peer group to the specified solution group.

delete.summary: Removes access for the specified peer group to the specified solution group.

get.summary: Gets peers accessible to the specified peer.
Checks access for the specified peer to the specified solution.

post.summary: Grants access for the specified principal peer group to the specified resource peer group.

delete.summary: Removes access for the specified principal peer group to the specified resource peer group.

get.summary: Gets a page of solution groups, optionally sorted.

post.summary: Creates a new solution group.

get.summary: Gets a page of peer members of the specified peer group, optionally sorted.

delete.summary: Deletes a peer group.

post.summary: Adds the specified peer as a member of the specified peer group.

delete.summary: Drops the specified peer as a member of the specified peer group.

get.summary: Gets a page of solution members in the specified solution group, optionally sorted.

delete.summary: Deletes a solution group.

post.summary: Adds the specified solution as a member of the specified solution group.

delete.summary: Drops the specified solution as a member of the specified solution group.

get.summary: Assesses the health of the application by querying the database.
Gets a page of notifications, optionally sorted.

post.summary: Creates a new notification.

get.summary: Gets the count of notifications.

delete.summary: Deletes a notification.

get.summary: Gets a page of peers, optionally sorted on fields.

post.summary: Creates a new peer.

get.summary: Searches for peers using the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Defaults to and (conjunction); send junction query parameter = o for or (disjunction).

post.summary: Creates a new peer subscription.

get.summary: Gets the peer subscription for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a peer subscription.

get.summary: Gets the peer for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a peer.

get.summary: Gets all subscriptions for the specified peer.
Gets a page of roles, optionally sorted on fields.

post.summary: Creates a new role.

get.summary: Gets the count of roles.
Searches for roles using the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Defaults to and (conjunction); send junction query parameter = o for or (disjunction).
Gets the role for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a role.

get.summary: Gets the functions for the specified role.

post.summary: Creates a new role function.

get.summary: Gets the role function for the specified role and function IDs.

delete.summary: Deletes a role function.

get.summary: Gets a page of solutions, optionally sorted on fields.

post.summary: Creates a new solution.

get.summary: Gets the count of solutions.

Searches for solutions using the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Defaults to and (conjunction); send junction query parameter = o for or (disjunction). With no limit, defaults to size 20.
Gets a page of solutions modified after the specified time, expressed in milliseconds since the Epoch.
Searches for solutions with names or descriptions that contain the search term.
Gets a page of solutions matching all criteria.
Gets a page of solutions matching the specified tag.
Gets a page of user-accessible solutions
Gets a page of solutions with the specified user in the ACL, optionally sorted on fields.
Gets a list of child solution IDs used in the specified composite solution.

post.summary: Adds a child to the parent composite solution.

delete.summary: Drops a child from the parent composite solution.

get.summary: Gets the solution for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a solution.

get.summary: Gets a page of download records for the specified solution ID.

post.summary: Creates a new solution download record.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified solution download record.

get.summary: Gets all user ratings for the specified solution.
Gets an existing solution rating.

post.summary: Creates a new solution rating.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified solution rating.

get.summary: Gets a list of revisions for the specified solution IDs.

post.summary: Creates a new solution revision.

get.summary: Gets the revision for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a solution revision.

get.summary: Gets the artifacts for the solution revision.

post.summary: Adds an artifact to the solution revision.

delete.summary: Removes an artifact from the solution revision.

get.summary: Gets the deployments for the specified solution and revision IDs.

post.summary: Creates a new deployment record for the specified solution and revision.

put.summary: Updates the deployment record for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified deployment record.

get.summary: Gets the deployments for the specified solution, revision and user IDs.
Gets validation results for the specified solution and revision.

post.summary: Creates a new solution validation record.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified solution validation record.

get.summary: Gets a list of tags for the specified solution.

post.summary: Adds a tag to the solution.

delete.summary: Drops a tag from the solution.

get.summary: Gets access-control list of users for the specified solution.

post.summary: Adds a user to the ACL for the specified solution.

delete.summary: Drops a user from the ACL for the specified solution.

put.summary: Increments view count of the specified solution.

get.summary: Gets web metadata for the specified solution including average rating and total download count.
Gets a page of step results, optionally sorted on fields.

post.summary: Creates a new step result.

get.summary: Searches for step results using the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Defaults to and (conjunction); send junction query parameter = o for or (disjunction).
Gets the step result for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes the stepResult with the specified ID.

get.summary: Gets a page of tags, optionally sorted.

post.summary: Creates a new tag.

delete.summary: Deletes a tag.

get.summary: Gets a page of threads, optionally sorted.

post.summary: Creates a thread.

get.summary: Gets the count of threads.
Gets a page of threads for the solution and revision IDs, optionally sorted.
Gets a page of comments for the solution revision, optionally sorted.
Gets comment count for the solution revision.
Gets the thread for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a thread.

get.summary: Gets a page of comments in the thread.

post.summary: Creates a comment.

get.summary: Gets the number of comments in the thread.
Gets the comment for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a comment.

get.summary: Gets a page of users, optionally sorted on fields.

post.summary: Creates a new user.

get.summary: Gets the count of users.
Searches for users with names that contain the search term.

post.summary: Checks the specified credentials.  Searches both login name and email fields for the specified name.  Returns the user object if an active user exists with the specified credentials; answers bad request if no match is found.
Creates a new user notification preference

get.summary: Gets the user notification preference for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes the user notification preference with the specified ID.

put.summary: Adds or removes the specified role for multiple users.

get.summary: Gets the count of users in a role.
Searches for users using the field name - field value pairs specified as query parameters. Defaults to and (conjunction); send junction query parameter = o for or (disjunction).
Gets the user for the specified ID.

delete.summary: Deletes a user.

put.summary: Sets the user's password to the new value if the user exists, is active, and the old password matches.

get.summary: Gets the deployments for the specified user ID.
Gets a page of solutions which are favorites for the specified user ID.

post.summary: Creates a new solution favorite record.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified solution favorite record.

get.summary: Gets all login providers for the specified user.
Gets the login provider for the specified user, provider code and provider login.

post.summary: Creates a user login provider entry.

put.summary: Updates the specified user login provider entry.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified user login provider entry.

get.summary: Gets active notifications for the specified user ID.

post.summary: Adds a user as a recipient of the notification.

put.summary: Updates the notification-user map; e.g., to record the date when the user viewed the notification.

delete.summary: Drops a user as a recipient of the notification.

get.summary: Gets notification preferences for the specified user ID.
Gets roles for the specified user ID.

put.summary: Assigns the specified roles to the user after dropping any existing assignments.

post.summary: Adds a role to the user.

delete.summary: Drops a role from the user.

get.summary: Gets the list of validation sequence records.

post.summary: Creates a new validation sequence record.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified validation sequence record.

get.summary: Gets the value of the MANIFEST.MF property Implementation-Version as written by maven.
